node.excerpt: It has been some time since I wanted to make my own website in order to write articles and share my work. As a Web developer, I have tried to build it from scratch but it was a lot of work and, while feasible, I never got the motivation to ever build…

frontmatter.title: Thank you Gatsby
frontmatter.abstract: How I finally got a blog working in 5 minutes.

frontmatter.title: Nix: a story of love and hate
frontmatter.abstract: I love Nix but sometimes you can only hate it.
